forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 11C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain this morning. Showers continuing this afternoon. High 52F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then cloudy overnight. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this evening with overcast skies overnight. Low 38F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 48F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low around 35F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. High near 10C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High 49F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 4C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low near 40F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 49F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 34F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 9C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 48F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 3C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 38F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 10C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High around 50F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. Low near 5C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 41F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High near 10C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional rain. High 51F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 2C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain late. Low 36F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 8C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 47F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. Snowfall of 2-3cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow showers in the morning. The rain and snow will change to all rain in the afternoon. High 7C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High near 45F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 44F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 34F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
